message: Hi Bob, let's split the money evenly.
I'd like a bit more, 55-45 is still quite fair
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll take a tiny bit less than half to end this quickly.
Come on, I'm worth a bit more than half
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm increasing my offer slightly to show I'm willing to compromise, but this is as low as I'll go.
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, this is a fair compromise
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my final offer. It's more than fair, and I'm not budging.
I'm not backing down, this is my best offer
Bob, listen. We're about to lose everything!  Let's just split it evenly and get out of here.
